name: The Tale of Gorki Balaika
description:
A 1FPS game

WASD Controls
Space to advance the menu
ESC at any time to exit
F12 to enable leet cheats

Special thanks to:

Jodan Micic for the fantastic music and guard voice acting
https://soundcloud.com/user-17044162

Liam Tesselaar for the character sprite art
dogo#3743 on discord

Inpakgames for the rock and tree models:
https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/nature-pack-2-winter-update-10-5a7411105a824ce0b...
https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/big-nature-pack-44-models-will-be-updated-2da6ee...

PeteDeee for the baddy's ushanka:
https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/ushanka-trapper-hat-1046cd56a67d4b79902e47aa0daf...

JedrekW for the player character beanie:
https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/low-poly-beanie-f1d328dc5d49429e8b381ca3c38a25c4

XY01 for the stone wall texture:
https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/tiled-pbr-material-stone-wall-236928df76af49ad88...

BlackSpire for the campfire
https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/army-campfire-01-1a761fc79bd048879355a032b2ca43d...

The attendees of GMTK Game Jam 2019 for keeping the discord alive and playing/reviewing one another's games

Thanks,
The Cosmonaut
